segments.text: We'd like to have a look around your house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course , please follow me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's so spacious , about 40 square metres , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are these corn ears hanging on the tree branch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very beautiful and very interesting . But why do you hang them in the tree ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They don't have enough time to peel it after they harvested them , so they hung them in the tree . Then in winter , they can peel corn ears in their leisure time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good idea . Sometimes such pictures can show the house's richness .
segments.speaker: S1
